description:
Two couples very much in love, but even time can erode at something once thought unbreakable.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mount Suenomatsu: Kiyohara no Motosuke / Sanekata and Nagiko: The Honorable Fujiwara no Sanekata
Suenomatsu-yama Kiyohara Nomotosuke / Sanekata to Nagiko: Fujiwara Sanekataason
末の松山 清原元輔 / 実方と諾子 藤原実方朝臣
